item.description:
( Note: This is NOT the Master Key System Study Group which "meet-up" on Mondays. )

"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone to share & support each other in applying the Law of Attraction consistently in our lives everyday to deliberately manifest our desires & live in jOY!

For folks who were at our Tues meetup, hope you're putting into ACTION living from a place of BE-DO-HAVE. Do come & join us on the phone to share your experiences & discuss any straggler questions.


To join, please register by emailing ChewHoong at chk.misc@gmail.com.
You'll get an e-mail confirmation with call-in details.
item.why: The safe & supportive yet casual atmosphere of the call is designed as a way for us to connect with like-hearted people in a very positive, high-vibrational way. Let's celebrate successes & manifestations and help each other with shared wisdom.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: LOA Masterminding
